venue.name: Microsoft New England Research & Development Center (NERD)

item.description:
Our next Boston BizSpark Meetup will be held on Wednesday, October 5th at Microsoft NERD on the 1st floor located at One Memorial Drive in Cambridge. This is an easy eastbound walk from Kendall Square Red Line T stop. There is also free parking in front of the building and paid parking in the basement garage entrance on the west side of the building.

At 6:30 PM Ben Littauer from Launchpad Venture Group will give everyone a primer on Angel Investing.  Ben Littauer is one of the most active and giving Angels in the Boston community. He also is a member of Walnut Venture Associates and Boston Harbor Angels.

At 7:30 PM Ben Littauer will hear pitches from Adam Miller from Abroad101 & Mike Norwood from Type-U.net.  Abroad101 is a MassChallenge finalist and generally a successful, kick ass startup!  Type-U.net comes from the startup junkies at the Babson MBA program and was a Summer at Highland participant.

Please RSVP and bring guests. We're always open to suggestions for topics for experts to speak on as well.

Microsoft Cambridge will be generously providing pizza and drinks as always!

-Marsh Sutherland  
Boston BizSpark Meetup Organizer
item.name: Angel Investing w/ Ben Littauer from Launchpad, Abroad101 & Type-U.net Pitches
